lyrics.text:
Fakafeta’i fai ma’u ai pē,
Ki hotau ‘Otua,
‘I he’ene manatu’i
‘A e tō ki lalo.

Pea ke tau fakafeta’i
Ki he ‘Eiki lelei
‘I he’ene tokanga’i
Hotau laumālie.

Fakafeta’i ki ‘olunga
Pea toe fai pē,
Fakafeta’i kia Sīsū
‘I he’ene ‘ofa.

‘Eiki Sīsū fakafeta’i,
Ki he ‘Afiona;
‘I ho’o ‘ofa pehe mai
Ki homau fa’ahinga.
